data.title: International Airlines Group
data.meta_description: We scout for and partner with leading entrepreneurs to fund, support and scale solutions with the potential to transform travel.
data.text:
We are looking for new technologies to help us elevate our customer experience and operations, such as digitised services for friction-free travel, new product offerings, automation and data science to optimise revenue and operational planning.

We are committed to decarbonisation and accelerating change towards a more sustainable industry. We support pioneers developing sustainable aviation fuels, zero emissions flying, carbon removal, electrification and sustainable materials.

We want to hear from companies developing solutions to fundamentally improve the way people and cargo move over the next twenty years.

Established innovation programmes

Our innovation programmes are some of the most established in the industry. We have deep experience introducing and testing start-up solutions, and investing where we see strong strategic alignment.

Leading aviation brands

Our group of leading aviation brands cater to distinct customers and geographies. When partnering with us, start-ups can access commercial opportunities across companies within our portfolio.

Access to industry experts

Our involvement goes beyond supporting proof of values and investment. Start-ups work with our industry experts who will share their knowledge and network to help you go further.
